mapper.insert: -- insertNatTssAltrSmry 개요 신규 INSERT INTO IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_SMRY /*국책과제개요*/ ( TSS_CD --과제코드 , TTL_CRRO_STRT_DT --총수행시작일 , TTL_CRRO_FNH_DT --총수행종료일 , STRT_DT --과제시작일 , FNH_DT --과제종료일 , FIN_YN --최종차수여부 , SMRY_TXT --개발대상기술 및 제품개요 , TSS_SMRY_TXT --과제개요 , TSS_SMRY_CTQ_TXT --과제개요 - CTQ , TSS_SMRY_DVLP_TXT --과제개요 - 주요연구개발내용 , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_TXT --연구개발성과 - 지재권 , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_EFF_TXT --연구개발성과 - 파급효과 , FNO_PLN_TXT --향후계획 , BIZ_EXP_ARSL_TXT --사업비실적 , BIZ_EXP , ALTR_RSON_TXT --변경사유 , ADD_RSON_TXT --추가사유 , DCAC_RSON_TXT --중단사유 , ATTC_FIL_ID -- , ALTR_ATTC_FIL_ID -- , CMPL_ATTC_FIL_ID -- , DCAC_ATTC_FIL_ID -- , FRST_RGST_DT --최초등록일시 , FRST_RGST_ID --최초등록자 , LAST_MDFY_DT --최종수정일시 , LAST_MDFY_ID --최종수정자 , STRT_DT_1 , FNH_DT_1 , STRT_DT_2 , FNH_DT_2 , STRT_DT_3 , FNH_DT_3 , STRT_DT_4 , FNH_DT_4 , STRT_DT_5 , FNH_DT_5 ) SELECT #{tssCd} , TTL_CRRO_STRT_DT , TTL_CRRO_FNH_DT , CASE WHEN #{batType} = '01' THEN CASE #{tssNosSt} WHEN '2' THEN STRT_DT_2 WHEN '3' THEN STRT_DT_3 WHEN '4' THEN STRT_DT_4 WHEN '5' THEN STRT_DT_5 END ELSE STRT_DT END , CASE WHEN #{batType} = '01' THEN CASE #{tssNosSt} WHEN '2' THEN FNH_DT_2 WHEN '3' THEN FNH_DT_3 WHEN '4' THEN FNH_DT_4 WHEN '5' THEN FNH_DT_5 END ELSE FNH_DT END , CASE WHEN #{batType} = '01' THEN CASE #{tssNosSt} WHEN '2' THEN IIF((LEN(STRT_DT_3) = 0), 'Y', 'N') WHEN '3' THEN IIF((LEN(STRT_DT_4) = 0), 'Y', 'N') WHEN '4' THEN IIF((LEN(STRT_DT_5) = 0), 'Y', 'N') WHEN '5' THEN 'Y' END ELSE FIN_YN END , SMRY_TXT , TSS_SMRY_TXT , TSS_SMRY_CTQ_TXT , TSS_SMRY_DVLP_TXT , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_TXT , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_EFF_TXT , FNO_PLN_TXT , BIZ_EXP_ARSL_TXT , BIZ_EXP , ALTR_RSON_TXT , ADD_RSON_TXT , DCAC_RSON_TXT , CASE WHEN #{batType} = '01' THEN ISNULL(#{attcFilId}, '') ELSE CASE WHEN ISNULL(#{attcFilId}, '') = '' THEN ATTC_FIL_ID ELSE #{attcFilId} END END , CASE WHEN #{batType} = '01' THEN NULL ELSE ALTR_ATTC_FIL_ID END , CASE WHEN #{batType} = '01' THEN NULL ELSE CMPL_ATTC_FIL_ID END , CASE WHEN #{batType} = '01' THEN NULL ELSE DCAC_ATTC_FIL_ID END , GETDATE() , #{userId} , GETDATE() , #{userId} , STRT_DT_1 , FNH_DT_1 , STRT_DT_2 , FNH_DT_2 , STRT_DT_3 , FNH_DT_3 , STRT_DT_4 , FNH_DT_4 , STRT_DT_5 , FNH_DT_5 FROM IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_SMRY /*국책과제개요*/ WHERE TSS_CD = #{pgTssCd}
mapper.update: -- updateNatTssSmry 개요 수정 UPDATE IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_SMRY /*국책과제개요*/ SET TTL_CRRO_STRT_DT = #{ttlCrroStrtDt} --총수행시작일 , TTL_CRRO_FNH_DT = #{ttlCrroFnhDt} --총수행종료일 , STRT_DT_1 = #{strtDt1} --과제시작일1차 , FNH_DT_1 = #{fnhDt1} --과제종료일1차 , STRT_DT_2 = #{strtDt2} --과제시작일2차 , FNH_DT_2 = #{fnhDt2} --과제종료일2차 , STRT_DT_3 = #{strtDt3} --과제시작일3차 , FNH_DT_3 = #{fnhDt3} --과제종료일3차 , STRT_DT_4 = #{strtDt4} --과제시작일4차 , FNH_DT_4 = #{fnhDt4} --과제종료일4차 , STRT_DT_5 = #{strtDt5} --과제시작일5차 , FNH_DT_5 = #{fnhDt5} --과제종료일5차 , FIN_YN = #{finYn} --최종차수여부 , SMRY_TXT = #{smryTxt} --개발대상기술 및 제품개요 , ATTC_FIL_ID = #{attcFilId} --첨부파일ID , LAST_MDFY_DT = GETDATE() , LAST_MDFY_ID = #{userId} WHERE TSS_CD = #{tssCd}
mapper.select: -- retrieveNatTssAltrSmryList 변경개요목록 조회 SELECT TSS_CD AS tssCd --과제코드 , ALTR_SN AS altrSn --변경일련번호 , PRVS AS prvs --항목 , ALTR_PRE AS altrPre --변경전 , ALTR_AFT AS altrAft --변경후 , #{_userId} AS userId FROM IRIS_TSS_SMRY_ALTR_LIST /*변경개요 목록*/ WHERE TSS_CD = #{tssCd}
mapper.insert: -- insertNatTssAltrSmryCrrd 개요 수행기관 신규 INSERT INTO IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_SMRY_CRRO_INST /*국책과제개요수행기관목록*/ ( TSS_CD , CRRO_INST_SN , INST_NM , INST_TYPE_CD , FRST_RGST_DT , FRST_RGST_ID , LAST_MDFY_DT , LAST_MDFY_ID ) SELECT #{tssCd} , CRRO_INST_SN , INST_NM , INST_TYPE_CD , GETDATE() , #{userId} , GETDATE() , #{userId} FROM IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_SMRY_CRRO_INST WHERE TSS_CD = #{pgTssCd}

-- insertNatTssAltrPtcRsstMbr 참여연구원 신규 INSERT INTO IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR /*과제참여연구원*/ ( TSS_CD --과제코드 , PTC_RSST_MBR_SN --참여연구원일련번호 , SA_SABUN_NEW --연구원사번 , DEPT_CODE --소속 , PTC_STRT_DT --참여시작일 , PTC_FNH_DT --참여종료일 , PTC_ROLE --참여역할 , PTC_ROLE_DTL --참여역할상세 , PTC_PRO --참여율 , FRST_RGST_DT --최초등록일시 , FRST_RGST_ID --최초등록자 , LAST_MDFY_DT --최종수정일시 , LAST_MDFY_ID --최종수정자 ) SELECT #{tssCd} , PTC_RSST_MBR_SN , SA_SABUN_NEW , DEPT_CODE , PTC_STRT_DT , PTC_FNH_DT , PTC_ROLE , PTC_ROLE_DTL , PTC_PRO , GETDATE() , #{userId} , GETDATE() , #{userId} FROM IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR WHERE TSS_CD = #{pgTssCd}

-- insertNatTssAltrTrwiBudg 사업비 신규 INSERT INTO IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_BIZ_EXP /*국책사업비*/ ( TSS_CD , BIZ_EXP_SN , BIZ_EXP_CD , BIZ_EXP_NM , YY_NOS_CASH1 , YY_NOS_ATHG1 , YY_NOS_CASH2 , YY_NOS_ATHG2 , YY_NOS_CASH3 , YY_NOS_ATHG3 , YY_NOS_CASH4 , YY_NOS_ATHG4 , YY_NOS_CASH5 , YY_NOS_ATHG5 , FRST_RGST_DT , FRST_RGST_ID , LAST_MDFY_DT , LAST_MDFY_ID ) SELECT #{tssCd} , BIZ_EXP_SN , BIZ_EXP_CD , BIZ_EXP_NM , YY_NOS_CASH1 , YY_NOS_ATHG1 , YY_NOS_CASH2 , YY_NOS_ATHG2 , YY_NOS_CASH3 , YY_NOS_ATHG3 , YY_NOS_CASH4 , YY_NOS_ATHG4 , YY_NOS_CASH5 , YY_NOS_ATHG5 , GETDATE() , #{userId} , GETDATE() , #{userId} FROM IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_BIZ_EXP /*국책사업비*/ WHERE TSS_CD = #{pgTssCd}

-- insertNatTssAltrGoal 목표 신규 INSERT INTO IRIS_TSS_GOAL_ARSL /*과제목표_실적*/ ( TSS_CD --과제코드 , GOAL_ARSL_SN --과제목표일련번호 , PRVS --항목 , CUR --현재 , GOAL --목표 , ARSL --실적 , STEP --단계 , UTM --단위 , EV_WAY --평가방법 , FRST_RGST_ID --최초등록자 , FRST_RGST_DT --최초등록일시 , LAST_MDFY_ID --최종수정자 , LAST_MDFY_DT --최종수정일시 ) SELECT #{tssCd} , GOAL_ARSL_SN , PRVS , CUR , GOAL , ARSL , STEP , UTM , EV_WAY , #{userId} , GETDATE() , #{userId} , GETDATE() FROM IRIS_TSS_GOAL_ARSL WHERE TSS_CD = #{pgTssCd}

-- insertNatTssAltrYld 산출물 신규 INSERT INTO IRIS_TSS_YLD_ITM /*과제산출물*/ ( TSS_CD --과제코드 , YLD_ITM_SN --과제산출물일련번호 , GOAL_Y --목표년도 , YLD_ITM_TYPE --산출물유형 , GOAL_CT --목표개수 , ARSL_YYMM --실적년월 , YLD_ITM_NM --산출물명 , YLD_ITM_TXT --산출물내용 , ATTC_FIL_ID --첨부파일 , FRST_RGST_ID --최초등록자 , FRST_RGST_DT --최초등록일시 , LAST_MDFY_ID --최종수정자 , LAST_MDFY_DT --최종수정일시 ) SELECT #{tssCd} , YLD_ITM_SN , GOAL_Y , YLD_ITM_TYPE , GOAL_CT , ARSL_YYMM , YLD_ITM_NM , YLD_ITM_TXT , ATTC_FIL_ID , #{userId} , GETDATE() , #{userId} , GETDATE() FROM IRIS_TSS_YLD_ITM WHERE TSS_CD = #{pgTssCd}
mapper.select: -- retrieveNatTssAltrInfo 품의서 정보 조회 SELECT TSS_CD , CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 23) AS createDate , (SELECT DATEDIFF(MM, X.TTL_CRRO_STRT_DT, X.TTL_CRRO_FNH_DT) + 1 FROM IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_SMRY X WHERE X.TSS_CD = T2.TSS_CD) AS mMDiff , STUFF((SELECT DISTINCT ', ' + dbo.fn_getSabunName(SA_SABUN_NEW) FROM IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR as T1 WHERE T1.TSS_CD = T2.TSS_CD FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') AS mbrNmList FROM IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR T2 WHERE T2.TSS_CD = #{pgTssCd} GROUP BY TSS_CD
mapper.update: -- updateNatTssSmryToSelect UPDATE T1 SET T1.TTL_CRRO_STRT_DT = T2.TTL_CRRO_STRT_DT , T1.TTL_CRRO_FNH_DT = T2.TTL_CRRO_FNH_DT , T1.STRT_DT = T2.STRT_DT , T1.FNH_DT = T2.FNH_DT , T1.FIN_YN = T2.FIN_YN , T1.SMRY_TXT = T2.SMRY_TXT , t1.ATTC_FIL_ID = t2.ATTC_FIL_ID , T1.STRT_DT_1 = t2.STRT_DT_1 , T1.FNH_DT_1 = t2.FNH_DT_1 , T1.STRT_DT_2 = t2.STRT_DT_2 , T1.FNH_DT_2 = t2.FNH_DT_2 , T1.STRT_DT_3 = t2.STRT_DT_3 , T1.FNH_DT_3 = t2.FNH_DT_3 , T1.STRT_DT_4 = t2.STRT_DT_4 , T1.FNH_DT_4 = t2.FNH_DT_4 , T1.STRT_DT_5 = t2.STRT_DT_5 , T1.FNH_DT_5 = t2.FNH_DT_5 FROM (SELECT TTL_CRRO_STRT_DT , TTL_CRRO_FNH_DT , STRT_DT , FNH_DT , FIN_YN , SMRY_TXT , ATTC_FIL_ID , STRT_DT_1 , FNH_DT_1 , STRT_DT_2 , FNH_DT_2 , STRT_DT_3 , FNH_DT_3 , STRT_DT_4 , FNH_DT_4 , STRT_DT_5 , FNH_DT_5 FROM IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_SMRY WHERE tss_cd = #{psTssCd} ) T1 , IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_SMRY T2 WHERE t2.TSS_CD = #{tssCd}
